title: Best and worst-performing NHS Trusts in England named
description: The new league tables score trusts on measures including finances and patient access to care.
content:
New league tables rating the performance of NHS trusts in England have been published for the first time, with specialist hospitals taking the top slots.
Number one is Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust, followed by the Royal National Ortho... [3662 chars]

title: Ofsted to bring in report card school inspections despite criticism
description: A new monitoring system will also be introduced, so schools can improve negative grades more quickly.
content:
6 hours ago
Ashitha NageshBBC News
Ofsted has confirmed it will push ahead with plans for a new "report card" system of inspecting schools in England, despite strong criticism from a coalition of school leaders, campaigners and former inspectors.

title: 'Visa threat' on illegal immigration and 'warring princes'
description: The home secretary's threat to suspend visas for countries that refuse to take back illegal migrants and the Duke of Sussex's visit to the UK lead Tuesday's papers.
content: The Financial Times leads on new Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood's threat that the UK could suspend visas from countries that do not agree to returns deals for illegal migrants. Mahmood, who the paper reports is known as a "tough political operator", ... [3248 chars]

title: NHS publishes league tables of trusts for first time - check where yours ranks
description: The government is introducing performance-related pay linked to the tables - and senior managers at trusts with consistently low scores could see their pay docked.
content:
The trouble with league tables is, however well-intentioned, they become a competition.
As soon as I saw the list, I scanned it to see where the trusts I've received care from had been placed.
Then I looked for the ones where my family and loved ones... [1001 chars]

title: Ferrari chair John Elkann to do community service over tax case
description: John Elkann and two of his siblings will pay €183m to settle an Italian inheritance tax dispute.
content:
The chair of Ferrari and Stellantis has agreed to do one year of community service and jointly pay millions of euros to settle a dispute over inheritance tax in Italy.
John Elkann and his siblings Lapo and Ginerva will pay €183m (£159m) to Italian ta... [2560 chars]
